caption.title: Effect of essential oil of Pterodon polygalaeflorus (EOPPgfl) on noxious thermal stimulation. A, Time course of latency of nociceptive response to paw exposure to 50±0.5°C. Data are reported as means±SE (n=8). B, Area under the curves shown in A. *P<0.05 compared to control; #P<0.001 compared to morphine (parametric one-way ANOVA, d.f. 1=2, d.f. 2=21, F=27.191, followed Holm-Sidak post hoc test).
